snippet: Over the last few years, skyrocketing costs, a brutal drought and plunging lamb prices have battered sheep ranchers across the country.
abstract: Years of skyrocketing costs, drought and plunging lamb prices have hurt sheep ranchers nationwide; industry, still relying on whims of summer rains, immigrant sheep herders and old grazing trails, struggles to stay afloat, with many ranchers laying off workers, cutting their flocks and selling at a loss; some ranchers have abandoned the business entirely.
lead_paragraph: Over the last few years, skyrocketing costs, a brutal drought and plunging lamb prices have battered sheep ranchers across the country.

headline.seo: Drought and Economic Woes Vex Sheep Farmers
headline.main: Drought and Economy Plague Sheep Farmers
headline.print_headline: Drought and Economics Cast a Shadow on Sheep Farmers
